content.en: Tomography algorithm advancements: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms for improving image reconstruction in tomography. These algorithms are attributed with the ability to deliver faster convergence rates, improve reconstructions from projections, exploit data correlation, find satisfying solutions for ill-posed linear systems, reconstruct attenuation coefficients, solve large and ill-conditioned inverse problems, optimize and flexibly implement regularization schemes, and find sparse vector solutions for underdetermined linear systems. These advancements in algorithmic techniques are expected to enhance the quality and efficiency of tomographic imaging.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for tomografi-algoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer til forbedring af billedrekonstruktion i tomografi. Disse algoritmer giver hurtigere konvergenshastigheder, forbedrer rekonstruktioner fra projektioner, udnytter datakorelation, finder tilfredsstillende løsninger for dårligt stillede lineære systemer, rekonstruerer attenueringskoefficienter, løser store og dårligt konditionerede inverse problemer, optimerer og fleksibelt implementerer regulariseringsskemaer og finder sparsomme vektorløsninger for underbestemte lineære systemer. Disse fremskridt i algoritmeteknikker forventes at forbedre kvaliteten og effektiviteten af tomografisk billeddannelse.
